segmentosSRT.text:
Mr. Long'er says
if you're busy he'll take a rain check.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: No, have him wait. I'll be right there.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: This is the last time, okay? I promise.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: I'd die happy if I could drive.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: I want to live. There's nothing like family.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text:
- The attack hasn't started.
- Let's put them down.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: we've got to make it back alive.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text:
And there'll be dumplings and meat
every day.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: how could it be your son?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: Tell me what else I can do.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: Thanks, we'll go to the factory bathhouse.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text:
- When did you get here?
- A while ago.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text:
But there were so many people,
I didn't come in.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text:
I've often tried to give you money.
You'd never accept it.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: It's all in this account. Take it.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: and my heart will be at ease.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: All my debts will have been paid.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: I just got an official notice.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: No, thank you, I've got to go.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17
